Package PresentationLayer

package PresentationLayer
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BillController
    Controller class for displaying bills in the BillView table Fetches all bills using BillDAO and shows them using reflection
    BillView
    GUI class for viewing all generated bills Displays a table of all bills stored in the database
    ClientController
    Controller class for managing client related actions in th GUI Handles interaction between the ClientView and the business logic layer ClientBLL
    ClientView
    GUI class responsible for displaying and managing client related data Provides input fields, buttons, and a table to add, edit, delete, and view all clients from the database
    Main
     
    MainController
    The Maincontroller handles user interaction from the MainView This class acts as the main navigator controller in the app
    MainView
    The main GUI window for the Orders ManagementSystem this is the first window showed to user when the app starts
    OrderController
    Controller class that manages the logic for handling orders in the application
    OrderView
    GUI class for managing and placing orders Provides a form for selecting a clients and product, entering a quantity, and placing an order.
    ProductController
    Controller class responsilble for handling user interactions related to products
    ProductView
    GUI class for managing products
